text: Alba Nora Gúnera Osorio (1942 – 1 October 2021) was a Honduran politician. She was the wife of General Juan Alberto Melgar, the Honduran military Head of State from 1975 to 1978. She was elected mayor of Tegucigalpa in 1990 and left office in 1994. She ran for presidency for the National Party in 1997 elections. From 2007 until 2014, she was a member of the National Congress of Honduras. Gúnera de Melgar died on 1 October 2021 in Tegucigalpa at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Honduran politicians Category:Mayors Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Honduras
title: Nora Gúnera de Melgar
